name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why do many people now prefer to report online with their real names rather than calling the police directly? 
Netizen’s reply: Because the police chief himself posted on the Internet asking for help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 27, near the Tang Dynasty City in Xi'an, Shaanxi.
A man holding a kitchen knife challenged a group of special police and armed police, but was later subdued by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the opening ceremony of the Paris Olympics, athletes from various countries entered the venue by boat from the Seine River. Because the Chinese team was ranked 41st and shared a boat with Canada and other countries, domestic netizens were upset. Netizens believed that even if they shared a boat, they should share a boat with the Hong Kong and Taiwan teams.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 27, Zhangjiakou, Hebei. An appendage of a building along the street in Sandagou, Shacheng Town, fell down, and a pedestrian was injured and screamed at the top of his lungs.
